com.serena.dmclient.objects
Interface DeploymentAreaAdmin

All Superinterfaces:
DimensionsObject, FileAreaAdmin
All Known Implementing Classes:
DeploymentAreaAdminImpl
public interface DeploymentAreaAdmin
extends FileAreaAdmin

This interface represents the properties for administration of a Deployment Area.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getFailTransferScript()
          Returns the name of the fail-transfer script to run when files fail to be transferred into this Deployment Area.
 java.lang.String getFilter()
          Returns the name of the area filter to be used when deploying files into this Deployment Area.
 java.lang.String getLibraryCacheArea()
          Returns the name of the Library Cache Area that will cache files from this Deployment Area.
 java.lang.String getPostTransferScript()
          Returns the name of the post-transfer script to run after files are transferred into this Deployment Area.
 java.lang.String getPreTransferScript()
          Returns the name of the pre-transfer script to run before files are transferred into this Deployment Area.
 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getScriptParameters()
          Returns the script parameters to be used in execution of transfer scripts.
 java.lang.String getStage()
          Returns the deployment stage associated with this File Area.
 java.lang.Boolean getStatus()
          Indicates the status of this Deployment Area.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.serena.dmclient.objects.FileAreaAdmin
getCreated, getCreatedBy, getDescription, getDirectory, getName, getNetworkNode, getOwner, getPassword, getUpdated, getUpdatedBy, getUser, isFetchExpanded

getScriptParameters

java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getScriptParameters()
Returns the script parameters to be used in execution of transfer scripts. The key is the name of the parameter and the value is the list of one or more parameter values.

Returns:
the script parameters

getStatus

java.lang.Boolean getStatus()
Indicates the status of this Deployment Area.

Returns:
true if the Deployment Area is online

getFilter

java.lang.String getFilter()
Returns the name of the area filter to be used when deploying files into this Deployment Area.

Returns:
the name of the area filter
